languages.text:
"Получено: 24 единицы неопознанных артефактов. Пусть остаются неопознанными. И в моей комнате.
Сбыто: 18 единиц оружия друкари, эльдаров и орков.
Украдено: ???
Мои же люди у меня воруют! Что этот мерзавец Мерд'Ки пообещал им? Узнаю — всем несдобровать".

traits.locale_text:
"Получено: 24 единицы неопознанных артефактов. Пусть остаются неопознанными. И в моей комнате.
Сбыто: 18 единиц оружия друкари, эльдаров и орков.
Украдено: ???
Мои же люди у меня воруют! Что этот мерзавец Мерд'Ки пообещал им? Узнаю — всем несдобровать".

languages.text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

languages.text:
「受領：正体不明のアーティファクト24ユニット。このまま正体は確認せず、自分の部屋に置いておくことにする。
売却：デュカーリ、アエルダリ、オルクの銃火器計18ユニット。
盗難：???
仲間が俺から盗んでやがる！マードキーの奴、あいつらに何を吹き込んだんだ？誰が盗ったのか突き止めてやる。絶対に許さねえ」
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

languages.text:
«Recibido: 24 unidades de artefactos no identificados. Se quedarán sin identificar en mi habitación.
Vendido: 18 unidades de armas de fuego Drukhari, Aeldari y orkas.
Robado: ???
¡Ahora me roba mi propia gente! ¿Qué les ha prometido esa escoria de Merd'Kee? Lo voy a averiguar y lo van a lamentar».
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

¡Ahora me roba mi propia gente! ¿Qué les ha prometido esa escoria de Merd'Kee? Lo voy a averiguar y lo van a lamentar».

languages.text:
“收到：24份不明造物。偷偷放在我的房间就好了，别让人知道。
卖出：18份黑暗灵族、艾达灵族与兽人枪械。
失窃：？？？
我的手下居然偷起了我的货物！那个天杀的莫德吉到底答应他们什么了？我一定要查个清清楚楚，到时候就有人遭殃了。”
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

languages.text:
« Réception : 24 unités d'artefacts non identifiés. Pas besoin de les faire expertiser, je vais les garder dans ma chambre.
Ventes : 18 unités d'armes à feu drukharis, aeldaris et orks.
Vols : ???
Mes propres hommes me vident les poches ! Qu'est-ce que ce connard de Mird'Kee a bien pu leur promettre ? Je vais mener ma petite enquête et ça va faire mal. »
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

languages.text:
"Erhalten: 24 Einheiten unidentifizierter Artefakte. Habe sie unidentifiziert und in meinem Zimmer gelassen.
Verkauft: 18 Einheiten Drukhari-, Aeldari- und Ork-Schusswaffen.
Gestohlen: ???
Meine eigenen Leute bestehlen mich! Was hat dieser Schuft Merd'kee ihnen versprochen? Ich werde es herausfinden, und dann gibt es Ärger."
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.
Sold: 18 units of Drukhari, Aeldari, and Ork firearms.
Stolen: ???
My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."

languages.text:
"Alınan: 24 birim tanımlanamayan eser. Tanımlamadan odamda tutacağım.
Satılan: 18 birim Drukhari, Aeldari ve Ork ateşli silahı.
Çalınan: ???
Kendi adamların benden mal çalıyor artık! Merd'Kee denen o it, bunlara ne vadetmiş ki? Öğrenince sıkıntı çıkacak."
languages.original_text:
"Received: 24 units of unidentified artefacts. Let them stay unidentified and in my room.

My own people are stealing from me now! What did that scoundrel Merd'Kee promise them? I'm going to find out, and there will be trouble."
